articles.title: Rising dengue cases in Uttar Pradesh put health officials on high alert - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. Rising dengue cases in Uttar Pradesh put health officials on high alert  Business Insider India

articles.content:
The increase in number of dengue cases, ahead of the monsoon season, has put health
 officials in Uttar Pradesh
 on alert.
